short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This generates QR code for the URL you are browsing. From version 2.0, you can choose different size and share it through email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension generates the QR code for the URL you are browsing in Chrome with a single click. Nothing is fancy, but it is very helpful! You can then use your smart phone to scan it and share the page to other mobile applications and your friends easily. Ver 2.0 allows you to customize the size of the QR Code and send it to an email address. Ver 2.1 fixed a bug to locate the active tab in Chrome. Ver 2.5 allows you store an email as the default address.

Let us know your ideas at zchen050815@gmail.com. Looking forward to it!
